item.title: Angelina add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Illusion is the first of all pleasures" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Moira Young
item.description: "Yer in my blood, Saba, he says. Yer in my head. Yer in my breath, yer in my bones...gawd help me, yer everywhere. You have bin since the first moment I set eyes on you." -- Moira Young

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Moira Young
item.description: "Ever heard of the rule of three? he shouts as we run. No! If you save somebody's life three times, their life belongs to you. You saved my life today, that makes once. Save it twice more an I'm all yers." -- Moira Young

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Moira Young
item.description: "Marry me, he says. I got all my own teeth, I wash twice a year an I'll cut you in fer half the business here." -- Moira Young

item.title: Angelina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be great in act, as you have been in thought. " -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Angelina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "I would challenge you to a battle of wits, but I see you are unarmed!" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Angelina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love me or hate me, both are in my favor…If you love me, I'll always be in your heart…If you hate me, I'll always be in your mind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Muriel Barbery
item.description: "I have finally concluded, maybe that's what life is about: there's a lot of despair, but also the odd moment of beauty, where time is no longer the same. It's as if those strains of music created a sort of interlude in time, something suspended, an elsewhere that had come to us, an always within never. Yes, that's it, an <i>always</i> within <i>never</i>." -- Muriel Barbery

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Muriel Barbery
item.description: "I may be indigent in name, position, and in appearance, but in my own mind I am an unrivaled goddess -" -- Muriel Barbery

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Muriel Barbery
item.description: "When someone that you love dies..it's like fireworks suddenly burning out in the sky and everything going black." -- Muriel Barbery

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Sara Zarr
item.description: "As much I love to imagine being alone in an orderly lab, I also know you can't stay in there forever and expect to do good work. Life is one of those experiments meant to be conducted in a stimulating, messy environment." -- Sara Zarr

item.title: Angelina add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "Everybody told me to be a man. Nobody told me how." -- Laurie Halse Anderson
